channel.title: USA on Mariatta
channel.description: Recent content in USA on Mariatta

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2023
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma After giving my talk (PEP Talk) at North Bay Python in July 2023, I went to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream in Downtown Petaluma for a Lavender Ice cream. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81) Here’s where you can find Angela’s Organic Ice Cream:

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2023
item.description: PyCon US 2023 was really special üòä I get to do Ice cream selfies with various people! Rockwell Ice Cream With Ned Batchelder (photo taken by Ned Batchelder, from his blog post here. We went to Rockwell Ice Cream. We ran into Drazen Lucic while at Rockwell Ice Cream. Capo Gelateria Italiana With Georgi Ker, Cheuk-Ting Ho, and Zac Hatfield-Dodds at Capo Gelateria Italiana. Never too late to post our #icecreamselfie with @mariatta @cheukting_ho and Zac to get 1 point @pycon US.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCascades 2020
item.description: Fifty Licks Ice Cream Elaine Wong, Lorena Mesa, and I, we gave a talk together about 9 Years of PyLadies. To celebrate, we went to Fifty Licks Ice Cream, for their legend-dairy (and non-dairy) ice cream. Achievement unlocked! @pyladies #IceCreamSelfie with @loooorenanicole @elthenerd #pycascades2020 @FiftyLicks pic.twitter.com/82jdEhWIqK — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) February 9, 2020

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Universe 2019
item.description: Uji Time Dessert After giving my talk, “Don’t be a Robot; automating workflows at scale” at GitHub Universe, I decided to spend some time exploring Japantown in San Francisco, and stumbled upon this place. It is so unique so I decided to get my ice cream there. Check out Uji Time Dessert for their matcha ice cream and taiyaki cones! üç¶üòùü§≥ Matcha ice cream with taiyaki cone and red bean topping ü§§

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Zapier Fall Retreat 2019
item.description: Wonders Ice Cream During Zapier’s Retreat, I gave a quick ignite talk about public speaking. Afterwards, with a few other Zapiens, we went to Wonders Ice Cream for Rolled Ice Cream. Unfortunately, I learned that this place has since closed down üòî View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyBay 2019
item.description: The Baked Bear The Baked Bear is known for their ice cream sandwiches! üç¶üòùü§≥ #IceCreamSelfie #PyBay2019 pic.twitter.com/GE6icRnLW6 — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) August 19, 2019

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2019
item.description: Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches PyCon US 2019 was a busy one for me. I gave a talk, a tutorial, and also ran the first Mentored Sprints with Nina Zakharenko and Tania Allard, AND co-chaired the Python Language Summit for the first time üòµ (I ended up co-charing it for 4 years). I went to Cathy’s Gourmet Ice Cream Sandwiches. The ice cream sandwich was really yummy! üòã I’m sad to hear that this place has since closed down.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2018
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma One perk of being a keynote at North Bay Python is you get to headline and have your name up on the marquee ‚≠êÔ∏è It’s really cool! Thanks North Bay Python for inviting me! I get to immortalize it in my ice cream selfie üòù Little did I know that I would return to the conference, and back to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream five years later!

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2018
item.description: Hammond’s Gourmet Ice Cream It was fun visiting San Diego for DjangoCon US 2018. I gave my talk Don’t Be a Robot; Build the Bot. I think it was well received üòä This was also a special travel trip, because, well it happens that my husband also needed to travel for work at the same time, so we don’t have anyone to look after our two kids. I ended up taking my kids with me to the conference.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2018
item.description: Mitchell’s Ice Cream At PyCon US 2018, I gave my talk What is a Python Core Developer. It was emotionally difficult to give that talk ü•≤ I went to Mitchell’s HomeMade Ice cream to celebrate. üç¶üòãü§≥ pic.twitter.com/MG8XdAqulv — Mariatta ü§¶ (@mariatta) May 14, 2018

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2017
item.description: What’s the Scoop PDX After giving my talk, Dial M For Mentor, I was feeling quite stressed out. My friend Jeff asked if there’s anything that would make me feel better, and I said “I wanna go get ice cream”. So we went to this place that he knew about. At that time, I didn’t consider Ice Cream Selfie to be a “thing” yet, but I think this is when it becomes a real “tradition”.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCaribbean 2017
item.description: Puerto Rico Kim Crayton and I went to Condado Beach prior to the conference. While there, there was an ice cream cart, and I couldn’t resist not getting ice cream.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ DjangoCon US 2016
item.description: Capogiro Gelato Artisans My first ever conference talk, and my first ever Ice Cream Selfie! The rest is history. Trio Gelato from Capogiro Gelato: Cappucino, Pistachio, and Bacio. While my public speaking and ice cream selfies continues, sadly Capogiro Gelato Artisans has since closed down. üò¢
